snippet: Laurie Halse Anderson’s “Ashes” is the last of a trilogy about young slaves’ flight to freedom across the Revolutionary War’s treacherous landscape....
abstract: Louis Bayard reviews book Ashes, final novel in Seeds of America middle-grade trilogy by Laurie Halse Anderson.
lead_paragraph: Laurie Halse Anderson’s “Ashes” is the last of a trilogy about young slaves’ flight to freedom across the Revolutionary War’s treacherous landscape.

headline.main: Laurie Halse Anderson Brings Her Revolutionary War Trilogy to a Close
